We have visited Aditya doctor for treatment of dengue in the past and for general enquiries.. Doctor  has a smile on the face and assists in clarifying doubts in easiest way possible..

*** ******* *** *** ********* I met him while in fever, he gave me some ******* viral fever medicines and asked me to whatsapp my covid report so that he can prescribe me next. I saw my message and replied back "I will call back". it's 3 days now. he is not bothered about the patients condition. 2 other incidents I have heard about him from my friends. so be careful******* ** ******* * **** *********** *** ******* *******
